name: bodhi-app
description: An open source blockchain explorer for monitoring Bodhi platform

scripts.pkg:mac: mkdir -p bin/mac/qtum; cp qtum/mac/bin/qtumd bin/mac/qtum/qtumd; pkg . -t node9-mac -o bin/mac/bodhi-app-mac --debug
scripts.pkg:win32: mkdir -p bin/win32/qtum; cp qtum/win32/bin/qtumd.exe bin/win32/qtum/qtumd.exe; pkg . -t node9-win-x86 -o bin/win32/bodhi-app-win32.exe --debug
scripts.pkg:win64: mkdir -p bin/win64/qtum; cp qtum/win64/bin/qtumd.exe bin/win64/qtum/qtumd.exe; pkg . -t node9-win-x64 -o bin/win64/bodhi-app-win64.exe --debug
scripts.pkg:linux32: mkdir -p bin/linux32/qtum; cp qtum/linux32/bin/qtumd bin/linux32/qtum/qtumd; pkg . -t node9-linux-x86 -o bin/linux32/bodhi-app-linux32 --debug
scripts.pkg:linux64: mkdir -p bin/linux64/qtum; cp qtum/linux64/bin/qtumd bin/linux64/qtum/qtumd; pkg . -t node9-linux-x64 -o bin/linux64/bodhi-app-linux64 --debug

author: bodhi.network
